<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

:v: mcdoll can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Thanks for the review!
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8598388810/job/23559111215)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8598388810/job/23559111437)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8598388810/job/23559111881)
While you're at it, could you add the topology statement?

Is it significantly more annoying to allow the uniform and topological structures to vary, as in `UniformOnFun.mono`? I would suggest doing it while you're at it, but if there's anything annoying we can also leave this for later (I suspect we will need it at some point).

This is kinda annoying since we don't have the `UniformSpace` arguments are not named, the statement becomes the old @-hell or we have to introduce more local notation. I think naming all `UniformSpace` arguments is cleaner, but there seems some funny problem with the order of arguments (Lean seems to not like named instances coming after explicit arguments).

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Topology/Algebra/Module/StrongTopology): add monotonicity lemmas
